item.title: The Different Types Of Options: Stocks, Commodities, Binary, and More
item.description: There are many different types of options. While stock options are perhaps the most well-known, options can be created for many other types of assets, such as currencies, commodity futures, and other assets. Letâ€™s go over some of the many types of options and their key differences.
